statements: SELECT * FROM ThreatData;
SELECT threat_id, threat_type FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT threat_description, threat_timestamp FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_type = 'Malware';
SELECT threat_level, threat_timestamp FROM ThreatData ORDER BY threat_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT * FROM ThreatData ORDER BY threat_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT threat_id, threat_type, threat_level FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_level > 3 ORDER BY threat_timestamp ASC
SELECT threat_id, threat_description FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01'
SELECT threat_type, COUNT(*) AS total_threats FROM ThreatData GROUP BY threat_type ORDER BY total_threats DESC
SELECT * FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_level < 2 OR threat_timestamp < '2022-04-01'
SELECT * FROM threats;
SELECT threat_name, threat_type FROM threats WHERE threat_level > 2;
SELECT threat_id, threat_name FROM threats ORDER BY threat_name ASC;
SELECT threat_name, threat_description FROM threats WHERE threat_level <= 3;
SELECT strategy_name, implementation_date FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE strategy_id % 2 = 0;
SELECT threat_name, threat_type FROM threats ORDER BY threat_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_type = 'Phishing' AND threat_level >= 2 ORDER BY threat_name ASC;

SELECT threat_name, threat_description FROM threats JOIN mitigation_strategies ON threats.threat_id = mitigation_strategies.threat_id WHERE strategy_name = 'Email Monitoring' ORDER BY threat_name ASC;

SELECT threat_name, COUNT(strategy_id) AS num_strategies FROM threats LEFT JOIN mitigation_strategies ON threats.threat_id = mitigation_strategies.threat_id GROUP BY threats.threat_id HAVING COUNT(strategy_id) >= 2;
SELECT DISTINCT threat_type FROM threats WHERE threat_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY threat_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatData;
SELECT threat_id, threat_type, threat_severity FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_severity > 5;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM Incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM MitigationStrategies WHERE LENGTH(strategy_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM ThreatData JOIN Incidents ON ThreatData.threat_id = Incidents.threat_id WHERE ThreatData.threat_severity < 4;
SELECT * FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_severity > 5;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM Incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT threat_type, COUNT(*) AS total_threats FROM ThreatData GROUP BY threat_type;
SELECT t.threat_id, t.threat_type, i.incident_description FROM ThreatData t INNER JOIN Incidents i ON t.threat_id = i.threat_id;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM MitigationStrategies WHERE LENGTH(strategy_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM threats;
SELECT threat_id, threat_name, threat_type FROM threats WHERE threat_level > 5 ORDER BY threat_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_attacks FROM attacks WHERE attack_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT target_name, target_ip_address FROM targets WHERE target_location = 'HQ';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, target_id FROM mitigation_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM threats ORDER BY threat_name ASC, threat_level DESC;
SELECT threat_name, threat_type FROM threats WHERE threat_level > 3;
SELECT threat_name, threat_type, target_name FROM threats JOIN attacks ON threats.threat_id = attacks.threat_id JOIN targets ON attacks.target_id = targets.target_id WHERE threat_type = 'Malware';
SELECT target_name, target_ip_address, target_location FROM targets WHERE target_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE target_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_severity > 5;
SELECT threat_type, threat_severity, threat_description FROM threats ORDER BY threat_severity DESC;
SELECT attack_id, attack_type, attack_date FROM attacks WHERE attack_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_name, system_status FROM affected_systems WHERE threat_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_severity > 5 ORDER BY threat_id DESC;
SELECT attack_type, attack_date FROM attacks JOIN threats ON attacks.threat_id = threats.threat_id WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY attack_date ASC;
SELECT mitigation_strategy, mitigation_date FROM mitigation WHERE mitigation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY mitigation_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, system_status FROM affected_systems WHERE system_status = 'Compromised' ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE threat_id IN (SELECT threat_id FROM threats WHERE threat_severity > 7) ORDER BY username DESC;
